revision.comment: Created page with "'''Trainers School''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,407,338 HP. {{Infobox dungeon |name = Trainers School |image = [[File:Trainers School.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Trainers School. |tokens = 757,500 |location = East of Haou'li Outskirts. }} == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {|..."
